channel.title: Omg!... read! omg!
channel.description:
[center]what my qeustion is as the follow
some people got like npc's with a different name and full dragon on and that sort of stuff... i would like to know how? how can i import and change the names of the npc's and how to put on stuff? plz tell me![/center]

item.title: Omg!... read! omg!
item.dc:creator: @junkyNL junkyNL
item.description:
@junkyNL wrote:

well how bumbumlongtime ?

and i don’t got class files, i wish i would had it. because my server is almost done. but a few things like prayer icons also need open client. and some other things need class files . to bad i don’t got class files.

item.title: Omg!... read! omg!
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

::Pnpc only changes a player to a npc, it’s impossible to wear any other items than what the npc has, unless you edit the class files.
